about_the_game:
Kenosis: the Liminal Tapes

In Kenosis: The Liminal Tapes, you´ll find a series of short survival horror games that will shed light into an obscure secret hidden below the intentions of an innovative medical treatment. But behind all these confidential projects there is a series of questions that are about our past, our memories, our identities, and our repressed feelings.

Enjoy this single player horror experience to explore the liminal spaces of the facilities of Rendramill Industries, solve puzzles, find recordings and documents with lore, escape the monster, and try to find your way out of the place where each tape takes place.
Each of the tapes on this compilation shows a new character, a new perspective on a crumbling project that is been hidden from society. But every new introduction brings a new monster, a new threat, obstacles that bring the possibility of learning about the sad truths behind every character.

content_descriptors.notes: Nude and semi-nude characters, body fluids, vomit, mutilation, trauma references, blood, suicide references.

name: Kenosis: The Liminal Tapes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 980
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Enjoy this single player horror experiences to explore, solve puzzles, find recordings and documents with lore, escape the monster, and try to find your way out of the creepy places of each tape.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
